com.ep.ggs.system.ticker

Interface Tick

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockTracker, ChunkGeneratorService, Dirt, Entity, Grass, Gravel, Lava, NetworkEntity, PhysicsBlock, Player, RedFlower, Sand, Server, SMPPlayer, UpdateService, Water, YellowFlower

    public interface Tick

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getTimeout()
      How many milliseconds each tick is separated by, where 1000 is 1 second and 60000 is 1 minute.
      boolean inSeperateThread()
      Weather or not to run this tick object in a separate thread
      void tick()
      This is called whenever the system ticks.
      String tickName()
      Get the name of this tick.

    • Method Detail

      • tick

        void tick()
        This is called whenever the system ticks. You should handle any unhandled exceptions in this method, if to many exceptions are raised in this tick, then it will be removed from the system tick.

      • inSeperateThread

        boolean inSeperateThread()
        Weather or not to run this tick object in a separate thread
        Returns:
        returns true if it will run in a separate thread, otherwise it will return false.

      • getTimeout

        int getTimeout()
        How many milliseconds each tick is separated by, where 1000 is 1 second and 60000 is 1 minute.
        Returns:
        The amount of milliseconds to wait before calling the tick() method again.

      • tickName

        String tickName()
        Get the name of this tick. This will be the name will appear in exception stackTraces when an unhandled exception occurs. The name of the current thread will also be renamed to this by calling Thread.setName(String)
        Returns:
